data.name: Haas F1 Team
data.title: Haas F1 Team
data.subtitle: Haas F1 Team
data.description: The Haas F1 Team, originally Haas Formula, is an American motorsport team that has competed in the Formula One World Championship since 2016. Due to a partnership with the financial company MoneyGram, it will compete in Formula 1 from the 2023 World Championship under the sponsorship name MoneyGram Haas F1 Team.

data.name: Mc Laren
data.title: McLaren
data.description: McLaren is a British luxury sports car manufacturer founded in 1989 by Bruce McLaren. The company is known for its high-performance vehicles, including the McLaren F1, P1 and Senna. McLaren has also had a successful history in motorsports, particularly in Formula One, where they have won 8 constructor championships and 12 driver championships.

data.name: Williams
data.title: Williams
data.description: Williams Grand Prix Engineering Limited, currently racing in Formula One as Williams Racing, is a British Formula One motor racing team and constructor. It was founded by former team owner Frank Williams and automotive engineer Patrick Head.

data.name: Ferrari
data.title: Ferrari
data.description: Ferrari is an Italian luxury sports car manufacturer founded by Enzo Ferrari in 1947. The company is known for its high-performance vehicles and its participation in motorsports, particularly Formula One. The company's iconic models include the Ferrari Testarossa, Enzo Ferrari, and LaFerrari.

data.name: Visa Cash App RB F1 Team
data.title: Visa Cash App RB F1 Team
data.description: The Italian Formula One racing team and constructor, previously named Scuderia Toro Rosso from 2006 to 2019 and Scuderia AlphaTauri from 2020 to 2023, is now racing as the Visa Cash App RB F1 Team in the 2024 season.

data.name: Aston Martin
data.title: Aston Martin
data.description: Aston Martin is a British luxury car manufacturer founded in 1913. The company is known for its iconic sports cars and grand tourers, such as the Vantage, DB11, and DBS Superleggera. Aston Martin has a reputation for producing high-performance, stylish, and exclusive vehicles, and has been featured in numerous James Bond films.

data.name: Red Bull
data.title: Red Bull
data.description: Red Bull Racing is an Austrian Formula One racing team, founded in 2005. The team is based in Milton Keynes, England and is owned by the energy drink company Red Bull. The team has competed in Formula One since 2005 and has had a successful run, winning 4 consecutive Constructors' Championship from 2010 to 2013, and 4 drivers' championship

data.name: Mercedes
data.title: Mercedes
data.description: Mercedes-Benz is a German luxury car manufacturer and a division of Daimler AG. Founded in 1926, the company is known for its luxury vehicles, buses, coaches, and trucks. Mercedes-Benz is also a pioneer of automotive technology and has a reputation for producing high-performance vehicles, including its AMG performance line and its Formula One team

data.name: Stake F1 Team Kick Sauber
data.title: Stake F1 Team Kick Sauber
data.description: The team was formerly known as BMW Sauber from 2006 to 2010 and then rebranded as the Alfa Romeo F1 Team from 2019 to 2023 through partnership agreements with BMW and Alfa Romeo, respectively. Sauber is set to make an exhilarating comeback in 2024 under the name "Stake F1 Team Kick Sauber."

data.name: Alpine
data.title: Alpine F1 Team
data.subtitle: Alpine F1 Team
data.description: Alpine F1 Team, known as Renault DP World F1 Team until 2020, is a British-based motorsport racing team that has competed in the Formula 1 World Championship since 2016. The team, which belongs to the French car manufacturer Renault, succeeded the former Lotus F1 Team. It is already the third factory Formula 1 outing of the French company

category.title: Hotel Costs for F1 Team Personnel
Excluded Persons: F1 Team's Top Three Highest Paid Employees
Engine or powertrains department and activities
Reserve Driver and 3rd Party Drivers costs
All foreign exchange gains and losses
Costs to the FIA by an F1 Team
Indefinite sick leave or disability leave costs
Employee maternity leave, paternity leave, shared parental leave or adoption leave costs
